climatePledgeFriendly.details: Cradle to Cradle Certified products are made with safer materials and responsible processes to positively impact people and our planet. GOLD ACHIEVEMENT LEVEL

features: Infused with plant protein and coconut oil, gently cleanses, nourishes and cares for your hair for more defined and frizz free curls for all curl types
Achieve up to 48 hours of defined curls with our system of shampoo, conditioner and Air Dry Butter Cream
Garnier is committed to Greener Beauty - our bottles excluding pumps and caps are made of 100% Recycled Plastic
Leaping Bunny certified, Cruelty Free and Vegan
body.description: Hair is almost entirely made up of protein, which gives hair its strength. ALL NEW, paraben-free Fructis formulas with Active Fruit Protein, an exclusive combination of citrus protein, Vitamins B3 & B6, fruit & plant-derived extracts and strengthening conditioners, are designed for healthier, stronger hair. Sulfate-free and silicone-free Fructis Triple Nutrition Curl Nourish Shampoo, with Coconut, Jojoba and Macadamia Oils, provides a supple lather for a gentle cleanse, that doesn't strip hair's natural moisture, and intense nourishment for stronger, well defined, smoother, frizz-resistant curls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Price! Can’t beat
reviews.reviewText: Smells very nice. Lasts awhile. Makes my frizzy hair look normal. I have very thick wavy hair. Gives you a fresh clean look. The price is unbeatable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works great on my curly hair. It works so well I can go a day or two without washing in between and I don’t need to use any other product. Just wash and go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Garnier Fructis Curl Nourish Shampoo 3pk
reviews.reviewText: I bought a 3pk of the Garnier Fructis Triple Nutrition Curl Nourish Shampoo for $8.11, which is a pretty decent deal. The curl nourish shampoo is for my 12 year old daughter who has very curly hair- type 3c/4a type curls. So far, it does seem to be quite moisturizing and the smell is refreshing and pleasant. It does help somewhat with taming frizziness and leaves her hair soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great option for curly hair
reviews.reviewText: I really couldn’t believe this was good for my curly hair when I found it. I always try to get something without sulfates and this was inexpensive. I haven’t scanned it on the Yuka app so idk what that looks like, but for someone on a budget that wants a sulfate free shampoo - I recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Leaves my hair smelling so nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product At Great Price
reviews.reviewText: Hello, fellow curly-haired girls! If you are like me, you’ve spent the better part of your life searching for just the right products to make your mop manageable. It is a stressful and expensive undertaking, certainly. The problem is that there are so many types of curly hair, and these differences are compounded by the varying environments we live in (tight spirals in North Dakota vs looser waves in Florida).For years I was told to use expensive salon-grade mousse and stick to sulfate-free shampoo and conditioner—but the brands recommended to me were either horrifically costly or left my scalp feeling oily even after multiple scrubs. In the store one day, I saw these and decided to give them a try as a last-ditch effort…and I’m so glad I did!I have fine curly hair that I color, and I live in the MidAtlantic region. I don’t smoke and I don’t spend a lot of hours in sunlight. I’ve mostly given up on heat styling as well, so your experience may be different than mine. But Garnier’s wallet-friendly sulfate-free offerings have been a godsend for me!Unlike many of the other sulfate-free curly hair shampoos I’ve tried, this one actually lathers up. My scalp and hair feel clean after use, but not oily or dry. I can actually feel my hair absorb the conditioner (I apply and then leave on while I soap up, shave and wash my face) but it rinses clean and my hair feels smooth when I run my detangling comb through before shutting off the water. About a week after making the switch to this shampoo and conditioner, I noticed a huge difference in my hair. It’s less frizzy and it curls so nicely now. I do towel-turban only before air drying, and I also follow up with other Fructis products (their leave-in for curly hair, for example).Recently I’ve had trouble finding these at the store, and switched to Suave’s new entry to the drugstore sulfate-free category. It doesn’t lather as nicely and while my hair still curls ok, it’s not the same. I’ve stocked back up on Garnier thanks to Amazon and I’m not looking back!If you have similar hair and environmental humidity, I urge you to try these. Even if they don’t work as well for your hair, at least you’re not out a whole lot of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Due to having no sulfate - I feel like it doesn’t properly clean my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product with NO Sulfates!
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a shampoo with no sulfates for sometime to stop the itching. This has done just that and my hair is not to oily or too dry. I'm happy.
I really like the smell after washing my hair. The price is cheaper than the other brand, it is a good deal.
This shampoo cleans my afro hair really well despite being sulfate free, plus it's not drying at all. Good price as well.
Very hydrating, a bit too much if you have very oily hair. Smells and lathers great.I did find that I think it may build up over time, so I alternate it with a most clarifying shampoo.
Makes my hair light and gives volume. All these reviews who say it contains sulfates clearly can’t read.
Good shampoo. Great scent. Good price and value for your money. We like this brand and would buy again.
